content: Keep your little ones safe from monsters and things that go bump in the night by placing this 3D Batman nightlight on the job. The lamp’s clever design creates a 3D image of the Caped Crusader’s bust that you can alternate between 7 vibrant colors.

Become an expert in the fast emerging world of cryptocurrency by reading Mastering Bitcoin For Dummies. You’ll learn the basics – like what Bitcoin is, where it came from, and how to use it – so that you can buy, invest, and learn how to keep your money safe.

Make snacking the best part of your movie-going experience by digging into this gourmet rainbow popcorn. Each one-pound bag of this yummy snack includes five alluring and delicious flavors – strawberry, banana, orange, blueberry, and green apple.

Prevent your clean and organized clothes from morphing into a disastrous ball of wrinkled fabrics while traveling by placing it inside the stand up dresser suitcase. The ingenious design instantly props up and transforms into a mobile closet.

Add some vibrant color to your kitchen’s bland palette by slicing and dicing with these rainbow kitchen knives. This five piece set comes with non-slip ergonomic handles and razor sharp titanium coated stainless steel blades with a brilliant iridescent color scheme.

Learn how to seem like a better person without actually having to improve yourself by learning how to fake it using this helpful book. Inside the informative pages of “Faking It”, you’ll learn everything necessary to appear like a winner even if you’re the farthest thing from it.

Make your little all-star’s dreams a reality by outfitting his comfy bed with this football player bedding. This 100% polyester machine washable bedspread is emblazoned with a giant football player graphic that transforms your little MVP into a professional football player.

The future of the human race is in big trouble now that automatic blowjob machines exist. It features a powerful motor, 3 rows of beads, and a triple gripping mechanism that’ll produce eruptions so powerful you’ll never want to go on another date ever again.

Effortlessly cruise over pavement with grace and agility by riding atop this wireless remote control electric skateboard. It’s designed to be able to carry you over a distance of seven miles on a single charge while traveling at speeds up to twenty-two miles per hour.

Keep your deepest secrets hidden in plain view with the invisible ink pen. Whether you want to inconspicuously hide some nuclear missile launch codes, or just write down the names of all the people you’ve ever had sex with, the invisible ink pen is the right tool for the job.

Add some natural aesthetics to your workstation using this wireless wooden keyboard and mouse. It features a reliable 2.4 GHz wireless connection with a single tiny nano-receiver that allows you to connect the mouse and keyboard using a single USB port.

Shock your taste buds with these mind blowing watermelon flavored Oreo cookies from Nabisco. It’s everything you love from the classic Oreo cookie, but it features a curious bright pink and green watermelon filling that will be a surefire hit during summer picnics.

See if you’re as smart as you think you are by trying to pop open this IQ test wooden puzzle box. This small wooden box features a weathered look that won’t attract attention and comes with two small compartments ideal for keeping small items safe from prying eyes.

Unleash your artistic talents during your coffee break by sipping your piping hot cup of Joe from this chalkboard coffee mug. The mug’s exterior is coated with a thin chalkboard layer and comes with a pair of chalk sticks so that you can doodle while your drink.

Get more use out of your everyday carry by placing your money and documents inside the Dango tactical wallet. It’s designed to house up to 12 cards and comes with a removable high carbon stainless steel multi-tool with over 14 built-in functions.

If your loyalties lie with the Dark Side of the force, this Star Wars BB-9E is the droid you’ve been looking for. This little app-enabled droid features realistic movement, holographic simulation that lets you explore the Star Wars galaxy, and it can interact with your BB-8 droid.

Upgrade the armor on your expensive new smart phone with the unbreakable smart phone cover. Capable of protecting your phone screen from cracks and scratches, this incredibly thin cover will reduce the everyday wear and tear on your smartphone.

Ditch those heavy straps and give yourself a more natural and nurturing way to carry your newborn by placing your baby inside the Lalabu dad shirt. It comes with a giant front center pouch that is designed to calm your baby and encourage bonding.

Kick your outdoor shindigs up a notch using Soundboks – the ultimate and loudest battery powered speaker on this planet. It’s designed to reach eardrum shattering levels of 119 decibels and features an incredibly durable waterproof body.

Enjoy your favorite frozen gas station treat from the comfort of home by making yummy Coca-Cola slushies using this frozen slushy machine. You can fill the machine with any soda to enjoy a nice refreshing tooth-rotting slushy packed with flavor and loads of sugar.

Give your baby bump some geeky flair by slipping into this Death Star maternity shirt. This creatively designed shirt features a large graphic that transforms your protruding belly into the sinister weapon used by the Empire to obliterate entire planets.

Apocalypse survival just got easier with this incredible 3-in-1 jacket that easily converts to a sleeping bag or camping tent in mere seconds. This clever jacket is perfect for traveling light while heading out into the great outdoors – as well as creating an impromptu shelter.

Pull off the bank heist of the century and still make it back in time for supper when you use the license plate flipper to help evade the fuzz. The plate flipper works great for displaying multiple license plates and makes an excellent modification for aspiring getaway drivers.

Give yourself another reason to never put down your smartphone by protecting it using this fidget spinner iPhone case. It provides protection against minor bumps and scratches and comes with a small aluminum alloy spinner on the back to keep your restless fingers busy.

Set a new personal best for getting hammered in the shortest amount of time possible by downing your brewskies with this double beer bong bottle funnel. You simply place two glass bottles into the ports, flip them upside down, and chug like there’s no tomorrow.

Put your beautiful set of pearly whites on display for all to see with these insertable hyper lips. Conceived by French designer Sascha Nordmeyer, they painlessly part your lips far apart to showcase your disturbingly radiant smile and aggressively exposed gums.

Getting visible into hard to reach places is easier than ever when you use this handy handheld endoscope camera. It features a lengthy 10 foot cable and 8mm 2 megapixel camera head and 6 adjustable LEDs that provide visibility in the dark.

Celebrate your love of modern art by lighting up the room with one of these abstract artwork light bulbs. Each bulb is injected with environmentally friendly silicone and paint mixed together to create a one of a kind piece that’ll provide some unique ambient lighting.

Keep your recycling bin from constantly overflowing by using this wall mounted can crusher to flatten beer cans like pancakes. This compact device fits in any part of your home and makes it remarkably easy to crush empty 12 and 16 ounce cans.

titleEN: How Not To Be A Dick
content: Keep your hormonal mess of teen from turning into a total jackass by having him or her read “How Not To Be A Dick”. Author Meghan Doherty provides straightforward advice paired with comical “Dick and Jane” styled cartoons to teach everyday etiquette.

Keep runny food from turning your tasty dish into a hot mess using these food separating plate dividers. Each semicircular divider can contain up to a half cup of food, sticks onto the plate using small suction cups, and is made from food safe silicone that won’t alter taste.

Give family game night an inter-dimensional twist by sitting down for a game of Rick and Morty Clue. You can play as either Rick, Morty, Summer, Beth, Jerry, or Mr. Poopybutthole to solve the mystery of who stole the plans to Rick’s portal gun.

Add some cool ambient lighting to your bedroom or desktop with this USB plasma ball lamp light. Using multiple beams of bright neon light, this USB/battery operated sphere creates the appearance of a magnificent corona discharge

titleEN: Memory Foam Neck Pillow With Hoodie
content: Sleep soundly when you’re travelling on the road or through the skies by bringing along this memory foam neck pillow with hoodie. The soft memory foam cradles your neck while the baggy hood gives you the privacy you need to rest and catch some Z’s.

Who wouldn’t want an identical clone of their penis? An ideal birthday gift for the Mrs., the Clone-A-Willy kit includes everything you need to make a silicone rubber vibrating dildo that is shaped just like your mighty Johnson from the comfort and privacy of your home.

titleEN: Air Fry Foods Without Added Calories
content: The GoWISE USA Air Fryer lets you enjoy your favorite foods without the added calories of oil. Touch screen accessibility to manually program cooking time, or select from 1 of 7 built-in smart programs: chips, meat, chicken, steak, shrimp and fish.

Transform yourself into a shapely little minion next time you hit the water by slipping into this Minions bikini. This brightly colored yellow two-piece bikini is designed so that your body resembles a happy giant minion when you put it on.

Keep your most valuable and prized wines safe with the wine bottle combination lock. This customized lock is designed to fit over most 17mm diameter bottles and keeps them completely safe from any interested parties with the help from a four digit combination.

Stop worrying about your phone’s power levels and simplify your life by purchasing the Janus One. Functioning as a standalone or as a handset for your existing phone, the minimalistic functionality allows it to last for three months without ever needing a recharge.

Slip on this cigarette holder ring before beginning your marathon gaming session and you’ll never have to pause the game whenever you want to take a quick drag. It’s resistant to bending and will keep your cigarette or joint out of the way while you play.

Give your gaming sessions a cool retro touch by playing them using the 8Bitdo arcade stick controller. This bulky controller features a nostalgic NES inspired design with a prominent joystick in addition to eight large red buttons so that you can play more comfortably.

Add new functionality to your smartphone by protecting it from minor scratches with the E-Ink secondary iPhone case. The case comes with a 5.2″ E-ink screen that lets you snap pics, make to-do lists, read eBooks, news articles, and even help you take the perfect selfie.

Ditch those loud annoying alarms once and for all! Wake up feeling more relaxed and well rested with this sunrise simulating alarm clock. The alarm gradually dims and increases the light’s brightness so that you can doze off and wake up more naturally.

titleEN: This Book Is A Planetarium Pop-Up Book
content: Use your down time to get to know the various constellations in the sky with help from This Book Is A Planetarium. This educational pop-up book comes with everything from a perpetual calendar and message decoder to a planetarium that projects the constellations.

Get hopped up on sugar just like you used to in the good ol’ days by gulping down a can of refreshing Jolt Cola. The original American energy drink is back with a variety of savory flavors and “all the sugar and twice the caffeine” of the original.

Get hot steamy lovin’ whenever the mood strikes by simply giving the “ring for sex” bells a few swings. This tiny red bell comes printed with the word “sex” on its provocative surface so that your indentured love servant knows just when to quench your sexual thirst.

If you want to skip the small talk and really get to know someone, then you should play the Big Talk Question Card Game. The game contains 89 small cards printed with questions to help you connect with anyone on a deeper and more meaningful level.

titleEN: Death Star Silicone Ice Cube Mold
content: Harness the power of the Dark Side to keep your drink colder than Hoth using this Death Star silicone ice cube mold. The mold is made from food-safe silicone and pops out perfectly spherical little Death Stars that are ideal for dropping in your drink of choice.

Make your trip to the lake go as smooth as possible by keeping the fishing caddy bucket by your side. It comes with built-in rod holders that keep your fishing rods closer to you so that you can sink the hook quicker and notice your bites faster.

Make your work come alive when the lights go off by writing your next piece using this invisible fountain pen ink. This unique pen features an intricately designed glass tip that you dip into a special ink that glows under a black light.

Keep your cast iron skillet looking like new by cleaning it with this chainmail skillet pan scrubber. They work infinitely better than steel wool pads and come in small 8″ x 6″ squares that make them easy to handle while you’re washing.

The Ivation all-in-one-camping power station is an absolute campsite must-have. It comes with a built-in solar panel to ensure you’ll always have power, comes with a built in flashlight, a speaker for SOS alerts and music, and an LED display that shows time and temp.

Get your little Einstein interested in programming and electronics with the Mbot programmable Ranger Robot kit. With the kit you’ll have everything necessary to build 3 different types of little all-terrain robots that can be controlled using your tablet.

Keep your documents safe by storing them in this cryptex mechanical steampunk flash drive. This one of a kind housing features an ornate design that contains four gears, that when perfectly aligned will grant you access to the flash drive stored inside.

Keep yourself safe and stylish when you’re walking down the mean streets of suburbia by accessorizing with the self defense steel bracelet. It measures just over 40 inches long and can be used as a bracelet, waist chain, necklace, or a very painful whip.

Stay dry without having to resort to uncomfortable ponchos or bulky umbrellas by slipping into the hands free umbrella hat. Available in 3 sizes, it features a collapsible cap, folds up for easy transport, and comes with 2 underarm straps that prevent it from flying away.

Add some color and whimsy to your home with these nostalgic arcade style light switches. These arcade light switches are great for game rooms or kids rooms, but look especially great in your parents basement that you still live in at the disturbing age of 38.

Slice through paper with warrior-like precision by cutting it with these katana scissors. Styled like the iconic Samurai swords common in feudal Japan, these Japanese-made scissors feature sturdy ABS plastic handles and razor sharp stainless steel blades.

Get on track to quitting your disgusting habit using this cigarette tracking smart lighter. This smart lighter syncs to your smartphone and keeps track of every cigarette you smoke so that you can be mindful and begin to cut down your daily consumption.

Make any plain wall pop by hanging up this LED color spectrum clock. Rather than bore you with a face full of numbers, this clock comes equipped with sixty LEDs that shine bright in every color under the sun and can be set to display various vibrant patterns.

Spice up your love life by surprising – and possibly frightening – your significant other with this full body fetish stockings jumpsuit. This glorified one-size-fits-all pantyhose garbage bag is perfect for kinky couples looking to heat things up.

titleEN: Light Up Color Changing Rose Wish Bottle
content: Bring some radiant color to your dull desktop using this light up color changing rose wish bottle. This eye-catching tabletop accent piece comes with a handy remote that lets you change the light color of the bottle with the simple press of a button.

Record your upcoming straight fire mixtape without spending a fortune on renting studio time by using this cardboard personal recording studio. It’s available in two size options, features a lockable door, ventilation shaft, and of course it’s entirely soundproof.

Become the ultimate hipster in town by transforming your Apple watch into a distinguished pocket watch. This clever attachment allows you to turn your fancy iGadget from a plain wristwatch into either an eye-catching necklace or pocket watch.

Give your little ones a reason to look forward to the darkness by firing off a string of colored bubbles with the light up bubble gun. This battery powered gun comes with a small built-in LED that lights up the gun and bubbles when you’re shooting.

Ensure your humble abode is always at the perfect temperature by installing the Nest Thermostat E. It can perform all the basic functions of the standard Nest Thermostat while being significantly cheaper and featuring a cleaner and more understated design.

Keep all your daily snacks organized and at hand by storing them inside these stackable storage container jars. Rather than having to deal with a bunch of individual containers falling all over the place, they conveniently lock into one another to avoid spills.

Make light of one of the greatest tragedies of the early twentieth century every time you sit down for a nice cup of tea by preparing it using this Titanic tea bag holder. This novelty infuser is crafted from silicone and sticks up over the mug as it infuses the hot water.

Keep your cutlery organized and easily accessible while you’re cooking by placing them on this magnetic kitchen knife holder. It comes with mounting screws for easy installation and includes a set of powerful industrial grade magnets strong enough to hold any size knife.

Give any area of your home some visually captivating ambient lighting using these smart LED light extension strips. They can be controlled remotely, set to various vibrant hues, and can be synced to movies or video games for a truly enhanced experience.

Avoid getting lost while you’re trekking through the wilderness by heading out with this military grade lensatic sighting compass. This high quality compass features a thermo-elastic capsule with a floating dial, rotating bezel, and a rugged die-cast body.

Guard yourself against the cold – and the Foot Clan – at night by hitting the hay dressed in the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles pajamas. The nostalgic design transforms you into your favorite member of the gang right down to their iconic colored bandanas.

When you’re eating on-the-go there’s no better cutlery to use than these lightweight folding titanium utensils. These incredibly durable utensils are heat resistant, non-corrosive, and feature polished titanium surfaces that won’t leave behind any unpleasant metallic taste.

One-up your local barista with an art school degree by creating your own masterpieces with this latte art printer coffee maker. This unique coffee maker utilizes delicious edible ink to print your artwork onto the surface of your latte in just 10 seconds.

Making delicious perfectly shaped fries is easier than ever when you use the easy food dicer. This helpful appliance works with a simple push-down motion and comes with interchangeable stainless steel blades so that you can slice, dice, and chop like a pro.

Gaze at the wonders of the ocean from the comfort of home by decorating your bedroom with one of these color changing jellyfish aquariums. It features a low maintenance filtration system and customizable LED lights that provide a stunning visual display.

Get the most out of your home gym equipment by adding versatility to your workout using this kettlebell free weight attachment grip. The lightweight grip snaps around any dumbbell’s handle so that you can use it exactly like a regular kettlebell.

titleEN: Ultra Loud Alarm Clock And Bed Shaker
content: If standard alarms just aren’t cutting it, this ultra loud alarm clock and bed shaker is guaranteed to wake up even the heaviest of sleepers. It features a 113db extra-loud alarm with an adjustable tone along with a 12 volt vibrator that’ll violently shake and wake you.

Stop disturbing the peace while you perfect your percussion techniques in your parent’s garage by using this drum set isolation booth. The booth is simple to set up and completely encloses the drummer to significantly reduce noise levels by over 15 decibels.

Building eye-catching complex geometric sculptures is easier than ever with these magnetic building blocks. This sixty-two piece set comes with a series of triangles, pentagons, and squares that are outfitted with magnets along the edges so that you can easily connect them.

Keep your head from bobbing around while you’re trying to catch some Z’s by bringing aboard this chin supporting travel pillow. This super soft machine washable pillows gently wraps around your neck to provide full support while you’re sleeping upright.

It only takes a few minutes in front of the Samsung CHG90 curved 49-inch gaming monitor to never want to leave your room again. This ultra wide QLED monitor features a 3,840 x 1,080 resolution along with an impressive 32:9 aspect ratio.

Everyone loves poop humor. So crack everyone up in the break room by sipping your morning roast from this “coffee makes me poop” mug. Crafted from high quality ceramic, it’s shaped like a big healthy brown turd and holds up to 14 ounces of your favorite beverage.

Ensure your cryptocurrency remains secure by storing it in the hardware Bitcoin safe. It provides top of the line security and stands out from the rest by offering both secure cold storage offline while giving you the ability to spend with the convenience of a hot online wallet.

Experience what it’s like to design your own thrill ride by placing your engineering skills to the test with the Roller Coaster Challenge logic and building game. Players attempt to solve a series of challenges designed to help them build a functioning roller coaster.

Make the outside of your refrigerator look like it was the scene of an epic ninja fight by placing these ninja star fridge magnets on the door. The flat surface of the ninja star creates the effect that the star it is lodged into the metallic door.

Class up your home bar’s appearance by personalizing it with your very own neon sign. Available in either a neon pink or neon blue hue, each box comes with over nine feet of flexible fixing wire that you can bend and cut into any design that you want.

The Bittboy handheld retro gaming device brings all your favorite Nintendo games to the palm of your hand. Styled like a pint-sized Game Boy, it lets you play all the classic NES titles and is available in five alluring color options.

English is a strange and beautiful language. Celebrate and contemplate this wonderful language of ours during your morning cup of Joe with this “I before E” mug. This 11 ounce ceramic mug makes the perfect gift for the grammar stickler in your life.

Now you can achieve razor straight cuts with ease using these 90 degree angle scissors. The ergonomic design keeps your hands out of the way while cutting, while the heavy duty construction allows you to cut through tough materials without breaking a sweat.

Keep your shower area mess-free at all times by hanging up this little octopus shower caddy. This helpful cephalopod comes with nine dangling and flexible tentacles with adjustable loops so that you can hang everything from shampoo bottles to razors and cloths.

Stop slaving away over a hot stove and leave the hard work to the automatic pot stirrer. This handy utensil is designed with adjustable axle and arms to fit various size pots, and packs enough power to stir heavy duty dishes like risotto or stew for up to 45 minutes.

Don’t let those worn down slivers of soap go to waste – now with the infinite stacking soap bar you can create a never ending bar of soap! When the bar whittles down to a sliver, just keep stacking. You’ll never deal with useless slivers of soap again.

Show your love for fishing by strutting your stuff in these fish slippers. These fashionable heels sport an eye-catching design and color scheme that make them great for any occasion like a nice stroll through the park or meeting the in-laws for the first time.

Take a nap at school, in the office, or even while traveling by using this ostrich pillow. The ostrich pillow takes napping to new frontiers, allowing you to comfortably block out external light, giving you some much needed privacy while you doze off.

Help your pup stay in tip top shape year-round with the doggie jogging hoodie. When winter comes around, your workout buddy will be ready to hit the track with you while staying warm and fashionable in this comfortable polyester garment.

Transform any room in your home into your private movie room using this portable standalone cinema projector. Small enough to fit in the palm of your hand, this wi-fi and Bluetooth enabled device can project a 150″ screen and has a 5 hour battery life.

Stay liquored up wherever you go with these flask sandals that let you store alcohol under your feet. Perfect for boozing it up at the beach or pool, these flask sandals hold only 1.5 ounces of liquid, so make sure you only pack the strong stuff!

Keeping the inside of your shower organized is easier than ever with this quick drying shower caddy. It can be conveniently hung on the shower curtain rod, features 3 large and 3 small pockets for storage, and is made from 100% mesh so it dries quickly after you’re done.

Create a first class experience even while flying coach by using the airplane cup and tablet hook. It easily attaches to the seat in front of you and provides a stable resting spot to place both your drink and your tablet/smartphone while you fly.
